sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含狗等的"吠，叫"之意。
means: growl ： 指被激怒的狗发出低长的咆哮声，以示威胁。用于人时，指咆哮着喊叫，怒冲冲地发牢骚。
bark ： 指发出刺耳的汪汪声，系典型的狗吠。
howl ： 指声音响亮，拖得很长，如哀愁的哭声。用于人时，指大喊大叫。

sentence.Network_en: Acceleration is accompanied by a resonating growl from the gearbox.
sentence.Network_cn: 变速箱随着加速传来一阵轰鸣。

sentence.Network_en: The bear exposed its teeth in a muffled growl.
sentence.Network_cn: 那只熊龇出牙齿，发出一声低沉的吼叫。
从喉咙里发出的低沉的吼声

PerfectNetExp.abs: DOTA英雄语音…… - 水鱼的日志 - 网易博客 ... Kill! 杀了他们! Growl *咆哮* Tear meat! 扯成碎肉.
雅思英语完整版_馆档网 ... grope 暗中摸索 growl 嗥叫；轰鸣；咆哮着说 grumble 埋怨，咕哝，发牢骚.
大纲六级后词汇 - 豆丁网 ... grove n. 小树林 429 growl n. 吠声,不平,咆哮声; grudge n. 怨恨,恶意.
...至于它的英文名字则比较奇特，Growlithe咋看应该是growl(吼叫)和lithe(柔软)的合成，只是为什么用这两个词.

list.abs: growl out是什么意思及反义词_翻译growl... ... growl about 咆削着说,抱怨说 growl at 对…狂吠 growl out 咆哮着说出….
we heard thunder growling in the distance ., 我们听见远处隆隆的雷声.
The same contractions that cause your stomach to growl also clean out the GI tract ., 导致你胃咕咕响的收缩一样能帮助清空胃肠道.
王文昌主编：英语搭配大词典  pdf 英汉 -... ... 「狮吼」 Lions roar； 「虎啸」 Tigers growl； 「羊咩咩叫」 Sheep bleat；.

entry.def: When a dog or other animal growls, it makes a low noise in its throat, usually because it is angry.

example.ex: The dog was biting, growling and wagging its tail.
example.tran: 那条狗在一边撕咬一边低声吼叫，尾巴也跟着摇摆。

entry.def: If someone growls something, they say something in a low, rough, and angry voice.

example.ex: His fury was so great he could hardly speak. He growled some unintelligible words at Pete...
example.tran: 他气得几乎说不出话来，冲着皮特不知咆哮些什么。

example.ex: 'I should have killed him,' Sharpe growled.

entry.def: If you say that something growls, you mean that it makes a deep low noise.

example.ex: The car growls along rutted streets.
example.tran: 汽车在车辙纵横的街上一路轰鸣。

means.word_mean: 1. the sound of growling (as made by animals)
1. to utter or emit low dull rumbling sounds;

auth_sentence.content: I heard Churchill growl sotto voce but audibly enough.

sentences.en: The dog growled at the intruder.

jushi.english: The dog was anrgy and growled at me.
